column5: well today i took a day off....one of the few i have left for the summer......woke my son up at about 5 and we were off to balsam.......mornin was a very nice one ...over cast ...water was like glass...and we started to pitch a few in 5 to 10 ft of water........   landed my first musky of the year ...wasnt a huge one....measured 21 inches.....by no means lew's standards...lol  anyway....son looks at me...and you could see  the look in his eyes.....i wanna catch one too.....well.....doesnt he start landing largemouths.......he lands bout 6 of them......now i have the look on my face....why cant i catch them......  all in all a great day.....i love watching him catch more so than me catchin them.....its such a rush to see his eyes light up....dad i got another one......lol  wish i knew how to post pics.....as soon as i figure it out ill post them....   cheers pete    here is my son with a few largemout
That's what it is all about!
Good Stuff Pete... But still no pics???? If you are having problems use the search feature and you'll have loads of info available to you.
Nice report, can't wait to see the pics.  If you need help with posting pics, there's a help section in the main page. If it wouldn't work still, feel free to PM me and I'll help ya out.

Gotta love fishing with the kids...esp when they are doing the catching.  My 6 year old says "What if I catch the biggest fish and you dont get anything?".  I say "I really hope that happens"...and I mean it!! LOL.  Here's a thread about posting pics....scroll donw the page and you'll see some pictures on how to post them in here.  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...c=20729&hl=
You're welcome Workwear!  Great pics...he looks like one happy guy!
